item.title: travel checklist ✈️
item.description: ​ Pre-travel checklist Download music on mobile (network unavailablility preparedness) Mobile recharge (talktime, internet), check and confirm availability of network Charge every device (electricity) Make credit card payments Cash in hand ATM cards and pins Necessary printouts (if required) Booking tickets (stay, travelling, if required) Research itineraries (local) Packing ​ Things to carry Hike/Travel: snacks (eatery) snickers dry fruits glucose small bag (quechua) sleeping eye cover neck pillow water bottle hygiene, skincare sunscreen brush and small toothpaste hand soap tissue roll lip balm hand sanitizer small towel gadgets power bank camera headphones clothing/accessories sunglasses/cap medicines crocin (fever/bodyache) loperamide (diarrhoea/loose motions) saradon (headache) ondem (vomiting/motion sickness) levocet (running nose) moov spray (pain relief spray) bandaides ​
